name: The Buckaroos
description: '''The Buckaroos''' were an American music band led by [[Buck Owens]] in the 1960s and early 1970s, who, along with [[Merle Haggard]]'s [[The Strangers (American band)|The Strangers]], were involved in the development and presentation of the "[[Bakersfield sound]]". Their peak of success was from 1965 to 1970. In 2005, [[Country Music Television|CMT]] named the Buckaroos No. 2 on its list of the 20 Greatest Country Music Bands.
